summary: This document is an email chain from May 2020 discussing immigration options, specifically Deferred Action, for a witness in the Epstein case. The emails are between FBI personnel and possibly other officials, seeking guidance on the appropriate paperwork and remedy for the individual.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Addressed in an email asking for information about the current immigration status of a witness in the Epstein case.

events.title: Email discussion on Deferred Action for Epstein witness
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails seeking information and a checklist for filing Deferred Action for a witness involved in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: There is a witness in the Epstein case for whom immigration options, specifically Deferred Action, are being considered.
The emails indicate coordination within the FBI's HUMINT Services Unit regarding Significant Public Benefit Parole and Deferred Action.
The correspondence seeks to determine if Deferred Action is the appropriate immigration remedy for this specific individual.
